extension.name: Any Telephone or Email Search
extension.description: Returns all telephone and email addresses for contacts in the database based on partial telephone or email address
extension.comments: Thanks to Jamie McClelland/Progressive Technology Project (jamie@progressivetech.org) for developing an alpha release. This stable release finds non-primary phone and emails, ensures a single result per contact, improves the matching on phone numbers, removes duplicate phones and emails for a contact, includes the phone extensions in the phone numbers, and displays all cities and states for contacts.
